title: Is There Life After Death? | True Ghost Stories
description:
Today on a chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

When tragedy strikes a group of young friends in the form of death, individually each and everyone finds ways to cope with this inconceivable loss.   

One finds comfort in dreams and believes she may have actually made a connection with him on the other side. 

She then goes on to pledge how his name and memory will live on, while his remains lie deep below the earth. 

That story and much more, today on this haunting episode of Real Ghost Stories Online!

To hear more real ghost stories, become a supporter of our show and get every episode, including our weekly bonus episodes at http://www.ghostpodcast.com or http://www.patreon.com/realghoststories

Watch more at: http://www.realghoststoriesonline.com/
